about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey in this classic, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG! Dive into a retro-styled adventure that combines the best elements of old-school role-playing games with modern features of a roguelike. Explore dangerous dungeons, defeat fearsome monsters, and uncover hidden treasures as you guide your hero through a roguelite full of challenges.

🧙 Choose Your Hero

- Play as one of 7 unique races: Elf, Human, Dwarf, Gnome, Troll, Undead, or Draconian each with distinct abilities and stats.

- Customize your hero’s journey by joining 10 different guilds: Nomad, Warrior, Thief, Mage, Healer, Paladin, Ninja, Ranger, Warlock and Shaman. Each guild offers unique skills and playstyles.

⚔️ Classic Turn-Based Combat

- Experience tactical and strategic combat as you face off against challenging foes.

- Master your skills, equip powerful weapons, and use potions to survive the toughest battles.

- Collect a variety of weapons, from simple swords to rare magical items!

🏰 Explore Dangerous Dungeons

- Venture into 10 different dungeons filled with traps, hidden passages, and powerful enemies.

- Find hidden secrets and treasures as you navigate through multiple levels.

- Each dungeon offers a different challenge and environment, keeping the experience fresh and exciting.

🛡️ Guilds & Skills

- Join a guild to unlock special abilities and improve your hero’s skills.

- Train with fellow members to become stronger and more adept in your chosen path.

- Become the ultimate warrior, thief, or mage as you rise through the ranks!

💰 Daily Rewards

- Collect gold from daily chests to help you on your journey.

- Visit the shop to purchase weapons, armor, and other items to boost your hero’s power.

- Find normal and magical items to strengthen your character and prepare for tougher challenges ahead.

📜 Features

- Retro pixel art style that brings back the charm of classic RPGs.

- Turn-based gameplay that emphasizes strategy and planning.

- An in-depth character progression system with countless ways to build your hero.

- Newly released game with regular updates, new dungeons, items and features based on player feedback!

🌟 Why Play?

- Nostalgic RPG experience with a modern twist.

- Endless opportunities for character customization.

- Engaging, turn-based combat with an emphasis on tactics and strategy.

- A growing world with new content added regularly.

🛠️ Dungeon Maker [NEW EXCLUSIVE FEATURE!]

Unleash your creativity with custom map and enemy creation! Exclusive to PC, the Dungeon Maker lets you design your own dungeons, shaping every twist and turn. But that's not all—craft unique enemies to populate your creations, complete with personalized names, stats, and even custom images. Bring your imagination to life and challenge players with your own handcrafted adventures!

🌀 Labyrinth Mode

Discover the new Labyrinth mode! In New Game+, challenge yourself with procedurally generated dungeons, filled with unpredictable layouts, deadly traps, and fierce enemies. No two runs are the same. Adapt, strategize, and see how far you can go.

Download now and start your adventure today!
